{{cpp/string/basic_string_view/title|back}}
{{cpp/string/basic_string_view/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++17|
constexpr const_reference back() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns reference to the last character in the view. The behavior is undefined if {{c|empty() {{==}} true}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
Reference to the last character, equivalent to {{c|operator[](size() - 1)}}.

===Complexity===
Constant.

===Example===
{{example||code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;string_view&gt;
 
int main()
{
    for (std::string_view str{"ABCDEF"}; !str.empty(); str.remove_suffix(1))
        std::cout &lt;&lt; str.back() &lt;&lt; ' ' &lt;&lt; str &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
F ABCDEF
E ABCDE
D ABCD
C ABC
B AB
A A
}}
